programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O ltimo e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedao de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrot-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo v Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei destrudo e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que esto tentando escapar o mais rpido possvel, ele v uma iluso de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola est no meio da preparao para um festival cultural.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: After a heated battle, Naruto has the enemy cornered, but a boy is taken. This boy turns out to be Akio, Todoroki's younger brother, who Todoroki thought was dead.

programme.title: Naruto comes upon an injured youth who has lost his memory. Tsunade is cautious about the boy's presence, but Naruto is impressed by the boy's kindness and insists on allowing the boy to stay.

programme.title: Tsunade believes that Menma has some connection to the Hidden Sound Village, and Naruto and the others head to the Land of Rice Paddies to check into Menma's Memories.

programme.title: While in battle, Naruto finds out that Menma is a member of the gang of bandits that attacked their village. Being called a traitor by the leader of the gang, Menma reveals his greatest secret.

programme.title: Tsunade assigns Shikamaru a mission which is to solve the kidnapping case of the Sand Village ninja candidate Matsuri carried out by the Four Celestials. Leaf genin is called together once again.

programme.title: Naruto and his friends succeed in driving away the infamous Akatsuki, who have mysteriously returned from the dead, but afterwards, a strange masked figure appears before him!

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Fresh, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Disenchanted by the harsh realities of life in the city, a smart, streetwise kid named Fresh strives to create a better future for himself and his family. He defies the odds by staying one move ahead of the criminals in a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Taxi Driver, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Paul Schrader's gritty screenplay depicts the ever-deepening alienation of Vietnam Veteran Travis Bickle (Robert De Niro in a tour de force performance), a psychotic cab driver who obsessively cruises the mean streets of Manhattan.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: When a young Amish woman and her son get caught up in the murder of an undercover narcotic's agent, their saviour turns out to be hardened Philadelphia detective John Book.

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime even if it means breaking the law.

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: School of Rock, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band and looking for work, he becomes a substitute teacher and turns his class into rock and rollers.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Go, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: An awkward teenager gets in over his head dealing drugs while falling for his business partner's enigmatic sister during one scorching summer in Cape Cod, Massachusetts.

programme.title: 20th Century Women, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A strong-willed single mother (Annette Bening) raises her teenage son with the help of two unconventional younger women (Elle Fanning, Greta Gerwig) in this look at a makeshift family's comic adventures in Santa Barbara during the summer of 1979.

programme.title: After Yang, (2022, Drama)
programme.desc: When his daughter's beloved A.I. companion malfunctions, Jake (Colin Farrell) uncovers details of the robot's previously unknown life hidden in the android's interior core, leading Jake to surprising discoveries about himself & his family.

programme.title: Aftersun, (2022, Drama)
programme.desc: Years after their last vacation, Sophie reflects on the rare time spent with her loving, idealistic father and tries to reconcile the father she knew with the man she didn't.

programme.title: The Captive, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man (Ryan Reynolds) finds himself immersed in the complex web of deceit that surrounds the mysterious disappearance of his daughter.

programme.title: Major League: Back to the Minors, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Minor league pitcher Gus Cantrell is given the opportunity to manage the South Carolina Buzz. The ailing baseball team is full of a wacky lineup of terrible players, but owner Roger Dorn is banking on Cantrell to make a top-notch franchise out of them.

programme.title: A League of Their Own, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jimmy Dugan, a washed-up ballplayer whose big league days are over, is hired to coach in the All-American Girls Baseball League of 1943, while the male pros are at war.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or theyll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindys addicted to tattling, and Jans hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: Big Daddy, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fatherhood is brought to another level as Adam Sandler employs his unique brand of humor to face the challenges of parenthood.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Bebe's Kids, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When ladies' man Robin meets the beautiful Jamika at a funeral service, he feels he must have died and gone to heaven.

programme.title: Party Girl, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: In this raucous comedy, Parker Posey ("Scream 3") stars as a hard-partying NY club girl who takes a job as a librarian.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: Taxi Driver, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Paul Schrader's gritty screenplay depicts the ever-deepening alienation of Vietnam Veteran Travis Bickle (Robert De Niro in a tour de force performance), a psychotic cab driver who obsessively cruises the mean streets of Manhattan.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: This Academy Award-winning Best Picture stars Dustin Hoffman and Jon Voight in standout, Oscar-nominated performances as a con man and a Texas hustler trying to survive on the tough streets of New York. The legendary John Schlesinger directs.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Arlong's violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Team is Formed! Save Chopper

programme.title: The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DEATH OF THE HERO! A SHOCKING TRUTH OF TIGER!

programme.title: In the wake of Fisher Tiger's tragic death, the once-mighty Sun Pirates are splintered by an ongoing quarrel between Jimbei and Arlong. Meanwhile, Queen Otohime's ceasless quest to help her people begins to take its toll.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SUN PIRATES SPLIT! JIMBEI VS. ARLONG!

programme.title: Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHAKING FISHMAN ISLAND! A CELESTIAL DRAGON DRIFTS IN!

programme.title: After an agonizing absence, Queen Otohime returns to her people with exciting news. Unfortunately, a horrific act of violence derails the queen's mission and changes life on Fish-Man Island forever.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SUDDEN TRAGEDY! A GUNSHOT SHUTS DOWN THE FUTURE!

programme.title: Jimbei reaches the heartbreaking conclusion in the story of Queen Otohime, Nami does something completely unexpected, and Hordy Jones makes a foreboding appearance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO THE PRESENT! HORDY MAKES A MOVE!

programme.title: Hordy announces his sinister plans for Fish-Man Island. Luffy and Shirahoshi are ready to fight, but Jimbei wants to wage this war on his own!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KINGDOM IN SHOCK! AN ORDER TO EXECUTE NEPTUNE ISSUED!

programme.title: Luffy and Jimbei come to blows over how to handle Hordy's uprising. Back at the palace, Brook embarks on an out-of-body experience with hopes of saving his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A RIFT OPENS UP! LUFFY VS. JIMBEI!

programme.title: Jimbei and Luffy continue their standoff, the New Fish-Man pirates go on a rampage, and Hordy begins to experience startling side effects from his pill-popping habit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SOMETHING HAS HAPPENED TO HORDY! THE TRUE POWER OF THE EVIL DRUG!

programme.title: Hordy's rampant use of the energy steroid makes him bigger, stronger, and scarier than ever before! The Fish-Man princes join the battle, but even they may not be strong enough to stop Hordy's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! AT CONCHCORDE PLAZA!

programme.title: Jimbei and Shirahoshi are captured by the enemy, and Hordy makes a shocking revelation to the population of Fish-Man Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SURPRISING CONFESSION! THE TRUTH BEHIND THE ASSASSINATION OF OTOHIME!

programme.title: Shirahoshi reveals that she knew the truth about her mother's murder all along, and Luffy makes a bone-crushing entrance when the princess needs him most!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHIRAHOSHI'S TEARS! LUFFY FINALLY SHOWS UP!

programme.title: Hordy announces his plan for turning humans into slaves, the people of Fish-Man Island throw their support behind a new champion, and Luffy amazes even his own friends!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A BIG CLASH! THE STRAW HATS VS. A HUNDRED THOUSAND ENEMIES!

programme.title: Luffy and the gang show off how much stronger they've become by issuing a brutal beat down to Hordy and his ferocious Fish-Man Pirates! Can anything stop the Hats?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DEADLY ATTACKS ONE AFTER ANOTHER! ZORO AND SANJI JOIN THE BATTLE!

programme.title: Hordy's men keep attacking, but the Straw Hats have new weapons at their disposal! Franky unleashes the fury of the Black Rhino, and Luffy turns the tables on Hordy with a little help from his Kraken!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: UNVEILED! THE SECRET WEAPONS OF THE SUNNY!

programme.title: Franky dazzles Usopp and Chopper by transforming into a gigantic fighting robot, Hordy tries to blackmail the Kraken, and Luffy introduces his fist to the Fish-man's face!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IRON PIRATE! HERE COMES GENERAL FRANKY!

programme.title: Luffy shows off even more new powers as he brutally pummels Hordy, but the main attraction proves to be an ancient and immense pirate ship that's heading straight for Fish-Man Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NOAH CLOSING IN! THE FISHMAN ISLAND FACING DESTRUCTION!

programme.title: Shirahoshi summons the courage to risk everything to save her world, Luffy puts his own life in peril by venturing into the ocean, and Hordy's devious nature fully comes to the surface.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY UP, LUFFY! SHIRAHOSHI'S LIFE IN JEOPARDY!

programme.title: Luffy sets the stage for a final battle with Hordy, Sanji kicks a giant in defense of Nami's honor, and Zoro puts his blades to the ultimate test against a steroid-powered fighting fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIERCE FIGHT BEGINS! LUFFY VS. HORDY!

programme.title: While Luffy and Shirahoshi try to prevent Fish-Man Island from being crushed, the rest of the Straw Hats square off against the meanest Fish-Man Pirates in the deep blue sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A MASSIVE CONFUSED FIGHT! THE STRAW HATS VS. THE NEW FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: Luffy is the only one who can stop Hordy, but he'll need air to survive the fight, so Shirahoshi's big brother risks his own life in a heroic attempt to get Luffy a bigger bubble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY LOSES THE FIGHT?! HORDY'S LONG-AWAITED REVENGE!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats continue to fight bravely, Luffy tries to find a way to save the island, and the horrible truth about Hordy's hatred for humans is finally revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SHOCKING FACT! THE TRUE IDENTITY OF HORDY!

programme.title: Hordy's twisted past takes center stage in a Fish-Man flashback. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi's brother begs Luffy to save his beloved homeland and wipe out the anti-human element!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO ZERO! EARNEST WISHES FOR LUFFY!

programme.title: Luffy's fist of fire puts Hordy down for the count, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of the remaining Fish-Man Pirates. Meanwhile, a very big boat looms overhead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S ALL-OUT ATTACK! RED HAWK BLASTS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of their enemies, Luffy summons the strength for one last brutal attack on Hordy. Now, about that giant boat
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: COMING TO AN END! THE FINAL DECISIVE BATTLE AGAINST HORDY!

programme.title: After defeating Hordy, Luffy turns his attention to stopping the Noah from crushing Fish-Man Island. Straw Hats and Fish-Men alike watch as Luffy tries to obliterate a boat with a barrage of brutal blows!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fish-Man Island was saved by the timely arrival of the Sea Kings, but all is not well. Luffy lost a lot of blood in his battle with Hordy, and fish-to-human transfusions are strictly forbidden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE FUTURE! THE PATH TO THE SUN!

programme.title: Jimbei must decide whether or not to join the Straw Hats, and the grateful citizens of Fish-Man Island host a fabulous banquet in honor of their human heroes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET REVEALED! THE TRUTH ABOUT THE ANCIENT WEAPON!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew learn of epic battle between Aokiji and Akainu, a forgotten foe tries to kidnap the mermaid princess, and Hordy's gang finally gets what's coming to them!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS STUNNED! THE NEW FLEET ADMIRAL OF THE NAVY!

programme.title: When Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji stumble upon a couple of Big Mam's henchmen extorting sweets from the peaceful people of Fish-Man Island, the Straw Hats make a new and very powerful enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHE LOVES SWEETS! BIG MOM OF THE FOUR EMPERORS!

programme.title: The Straw Hats prepare to depart Fish-Man Island, a lion and a caribou come to blows over booby-trapped treasure, and Vice Admiral Smoker makes his presence felt in the New World!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MANY PROBLEMS LIE AHEAD! A TRAP AWAITING IN THE NEW WORLD!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew bid farewell to their new friends before setting off in search of the greatest adventures the New World has to offer!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FINALLY TIME TO GO! GOODBYE, FISHMAN ISLAND!

programme.title: Luffy and Usopp's extreme deep sea fishing adventure lands the crew in the middle of a deadly whirlpool, but an unexpected encounter with a pod of giant whales may bail the Straw Hats out of hot water!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE NEW WORLD! HEADING FOR THE ULTIMATE SEA!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Good-Bye Partner"
programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: Moon, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: The cattle drive reaches Nebraska, where Gus and Clara reunite. Drought and Indian attacks take their toll as the drive reaches Montana, and Gus is wounded. Call honors his best friend's request.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land baron and his hired gun.

programme.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier lawman Wyatt Earp joins his three brothers in their feud against the villainous Clanton gang, a local clan of cattle thieves in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: Man With The Gun, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum portrays an Exterminator--in the American West. He will, for a price, eliminate any outlaws annoying the peace of any Western town. When his wife, in disgust, leaves him, he pursues her, only to encounter his greatest gunfighting challenge.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: Beyond The Purple Hills, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry becomes the new Sheriff after bank robbers kill the former sheriff. When Judge Beaumont is murdered, evidence points to the judge's wild son. Believing the young man, Gene tries to help.

programme.title: Cast A Long Shadow, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Audie Murphy plays Matt, a troubled saddle tramp with a penchant for drinking. When he inherits a massive ranch, it leads him back into the arms of an old flame (Terry Moore), as well as into the fists some old rivals who would rather see him dead.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Identity, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: What if every choice we ever make was already made for us? What if there really were no coincidences in life and our destinies were already predetermined? Ten strangers with secrets are brought together in a savage rainstorm. Rated: R

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, (2008, Romance)
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Cate Blanchett star in the adaption of F. Scott Fitzgerald's story about an elderly man who ages backward and the problems that arise when he falls in love with a woman.

programme.title: Tigerland, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: As a nation stands divided over the war in Vietnam, stark differences of opinion surface among the men of A-Company, triggering unexpected and far-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed

programme.title: Demolidor - O Homem sem Medo
programme.desc: Um homem cegado por resduos txicos, que tambm ampliaram os seus outros sentidos, luta contra o crime como um super-heri acrobtico das artes marciais.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Sr. & Sra. Smith
programme.desc: Um casal entediado fica surpreso ao descobrir que ambos so assassinos contratados por agncias rivais para se matarem.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: Callum Lynch explora as memrias de seu ancestral Aguilar Nerha e se torna um Mestre Assassino para enfrentar a sociedade secreta dos Templrios.

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra
programme.desc: Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, inflexvel e politicamente incorreto, tero a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata.

programme.title: Possuda
programme.desc: Depois de descobrir que sua irm mais velha foi mordida por um lobisomem, a adolescente Brigitte embarca em uma misso desesperada para encontrar uma maneira de reverter o feitio e salv-la antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: A Cura
programme.desc: Um executivo enviado para resgatar o CEO de sua empresa de um misterioso centro de bem-estar.

programme.title: Espelhos do Medo
programme.desc: O mal usa espelhos para entrar na casa de um segurana com problemas.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 2
programme.desc: Jigsaw est de volta. O gnio brilhante e perturbado retorna para outra rodada de jogos mortais horripilantes.

programme.title: O Grito
programme.desc: Karen uma enfermeira americana que vive em Tquio e exposta a uma misteriosa maldio sobrenatural: um esprito vingativo que possui uma pessoa com uma raiva poderosa antes de reivindicar sua vida e se espalhar para outra vtima.

programme.title: O Grito 2
programme.desc: Com Amber Tamblyn e Arielle Kebbel. Em Tquio, a irm de uma garota previamente morta por uma maldio maligna acidentalmente infligida a si mesma. Com a ajuda de um jornalista, ela deve aprender como impedi-lo de uma vez por todas.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Matador de Aluguel
programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.title: Histria de um Assassinato
programme.desc: Vera, uma famosa atriz de Nova York, deixa seu ex-namorado problemtico entrar em seu apartamento. Tudo se complica quando ele decide atac-la.

programme.title: O Corpo
programme.desc: Holly, Cali e Mel se renem na vspera de Natal, na casa de Mel, para comemorar. Entediadas, Cali convence as amigas que devem ir casa do seu tio. Na casa, Holly encontra provas que a levam a acreditar que Cali no est relacionada aos proprietrios.

programme.title: Tubares de Gelo
programme.desc: Uma nova raa de tubares vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estao de pesquisa do rtico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Os Guardies
programme.desc: A histria ambientada na Guerra Fria e acompanha um esquadro de heris reunidos pela extinta Unio Sovitica. Depois de passar anos escondendo suas identidades, eles tero enfrentar uma perigosa fora do passado.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh
programme.desc: Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas acusado de assassinato e foge com um refm que talvez possa quebrar o sistema.

programme.title: Pnico em Seattle
programme.desc: Quando uma grande tempestade ameaa o noroeste do Pacfico, uma famlia deve se encontrar e trabalhar junta para acabar com a tempestade antes que ela se espalhe alm de seu controle e aniquile o planeta!

programme.title: Ces de Luta
programme.desc: Na tradio de UNDERWORLD e DISTRICT 9, toda Manhattan fica em quarentena quando o vrus Lupin se espalha como fogo, transformando civis inocentes em lobos vorazes. Nada menos que uma exploso nuclear pode parar o vrus monstruoso.

programme.title: Luta Pela Liberdade

programme.title: A misso para resgatar Kaiba continua com uma ajudinha de... Mai? Mas ser que Yugi e seus amigos se adaptaro a um mundo virtual em que as regras e estratgias mudam a toda hora?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E44

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos resgatam Kaiba, mas ainda esto presos no jogo! A nica sada requer enfrentar o Drago de Cinco Cabeas, mas Joey, Mokuba e Mai perdem todos os seus pontos de vida no difcil duelo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E45

programme.title: Um novo aluno, Duke Devlin, derrota Joey em um jogo de Duel Monsters, forando Joey a ser seu servo. Duke fora Joey a usar um uniforme de cachorro e o humilha em pblico, forando Yugi a desafiar Duke para um duelo.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E46

programme.title: Em troca da liberdade de Joey, Yugi concorda em desistir de Duel Monsters para sempre se ele perder. Sem conhecer bem as regras, Yugi comea mal. As chances dele no melhoram, e Duke revela que criou Monstros dos Dados-Masmorra com a ajuda de Pegasus!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E47

programme.title: Yugi usa suas habilidades de jogo natas para virar a mesa contra Duke, mas Duke menciona mais uma regra: todas as criaturas ocupam territrio no tabuleiro-grade.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E48

programme.title: Depois que o todo-poderoso Orgoth, o Implacvel de Duke deixa toda a esquadra de monstros de Yugi em pedaos, Yugi s tem mais um turno antes de perder todos os seus pontos de vida!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E49

programme.title: Um cartomante arcano rouba o Enigma do Milnio, e Yugi precisa defend-lo em um duelo para recuper-lo! No entanto, no se trata de um simples advinho. Ele um inimigo familiar e formidvel do Reino dos Duelistas. Ou talvez no?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E1

programme.title: A misteriosa ameaa que controla Bandit Keith estilhaa o Enigma do Milnio antes de atear fogo na arena de duelos! Ser que Yugi consegue remontar o Enigma do Milnio e salvar o esprito antes que tudo seja engolido pelas chamas?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E2

programme.title: A neve est caindo fora de poca. Mirok sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vo procur-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E7

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jia que parece pertencer ao Exrcito, mas a luz no emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom mdico o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E9

programme.title: A personalidade m de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianas o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E10

programme.title: H uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak no pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vo procurar uma pista diferente.

programme.title: A batalha entre Bankotsu e Inuyasha comea. Enquanto isso, Sesshomaru chega ao Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E12

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E13

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E16

programme.title: Suikotsu no pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Aps isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vo para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E17

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permisso. Ao faz-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E18

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei so os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E19

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a mmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E20

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relao ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E21

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E22

programme.title: The Girl on the Train (2016)
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her divorce, spends her commute fantasizing about the couple that lives in a house that her train passes. One morning, she sees something shocking and becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation.

programme.title: Valkyrie (2008)
programme.desc: Fearing that Hitler will destroy his beloved Germany, Col. Claus von Stauffenberg (Tom Cruise) joins a group of high-ranking men who are plotting to assassinate him.

programme.title: Proud Mary (2018)
programme.desc: Mary is a professional assassin who works for a ruthless gangster and his organized crime family in Boston. Her desire to save a 12-year-old boy from the streets soon causes an all-out turf war that forces her to take down whoever stands in her way.

programme.title: Fight or Flight (2024)
programme.desc: A mercenary takes on the job of tracking a high-value asset known only as "The Ghost" on an international flight. Realizing the plane is filled with assassins assigned to kill them both, the pair must work together in a fight for their lives.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: The Night Clerk (2020)
programme.desc: A hotel clerk becomes the prime suspect when a woman is murdered during his shift. As the police investigation closes in, he makes a personal connection with a guest -- but soon realizes he must stop the killer before she becomes the next victim.

programme.title: The Riot Club (2014)
programme.desc: Two first-year students (Sam Claflin, Max Irons) at Oxford University join a secret society and learn that their reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of one evening.

programme.title: Ride (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to raise money for his daughters cancer treatment, a retired bull rider teams up with his estranged son to orchestrate a robbery. However, they must soon outwit the local police if they want to keep the cash and their freedom.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker (2002)
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: The Last Gunfight (2025)
programme.desc: As the worlds top assassins fight to the death in a ruthless underground tournament, a rogue crew has its own deadly agenda: survive the carnage, outplay the killers and take down the mastermind behind it all.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: Cloverfield (2008)
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: Becky (2020)
programme.desc: Spunky and rebellious Becky tries to reconnect with her father during a weekend getaway at a lakefront house. But the trip soon takes a turn for the worse when convicts on the run, led by the merciless Dominick, suddenly invade the home.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: La Madrina: The Savage Life of Lorine Padilla (2020)
programme.sub-title: La Madrina: The Savage Life of Lorine Padilla (2020)
programme.desc: Lorine Padilla joins a street gang in the Bronx, N.Y., before becoming an activist and spiritual adviser.

programme.title: Bitchin: The Sound and Fury of Rick James
programme.desc: A raw and intimate documentary look at the wildly colorful life of legendary funk artist Rick James; original interviews with artists, collaborators and friends.

programme.title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
programme.sub-title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Oliver Stone examines the circumstances surrounding the assassination of President John F. Kennedy on Nov. 22, 1963, in Dallas.

programme.title: Chuck (2016)
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.

programme.title: Gasoline Alley (2022)
programme.desc: Set in the underbelly of Los Angeles, a man is drawn into a high-profile triple murder. The two police detectives on his tail soon join him in attempting to uncover an explosive conspiracy.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers (2006)
programme.desc: Some of the servicemen who raised the U.S. flag on Mount Suribachi during the Battle of Iwo Jima at the end of World War II live to hear of their status as heroes.

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates (2001)
programme.desc: A Nazi sniper (Ed Harris) travels to Stalingrad to find and kill a Russian sharpshooter (Jude Law), the hero of the propaganda campaign of a political officer (Joseph Fiennes).
